text: Siantar Station is railway station located in Pematangsiantar, North Sumatra. The station is located at an altitude of +383.47 m. Siantar station is the station at the southernmost tip for branches of North Sumatran Main Line, connecting Tebing Tinggi to Pematangsiantar. Between the end of this rail with Pertamina fuel depot separated by a highway that ran just above the underground pipes. ==References== ==External links== * category:pematangsiantar Category:Railway stations in North Sumatra Category:Cultural Properties of Indonesia in North Sumatra
title: Siantar railway station
